responses.content:
NPAG — 6 NPC agency actions resolved (30 Ilrym):

1. Valania Lorethor (Vornost, with PC): Five recall letters dispatched with escort riders before dawn. Caras agent reorders received — full intelligence profile on Conorth, Golden Hind leadership, and Conorth's secretary. Valania estimates 3 days for Khuzdukan group, 4 for Seawatch pair.

2. Suzanne of Corlaine (Khuzduk Hills → en route to Fort Seawatch): Departed Khuzdukan with Guldur via the Dwarven Bridge. Yor-Kazh strapped to her back, silent for now. She sets a hard pace. Guldur keeps up but complains about the terrain.

3. Lithoe Wano-Kan (Khuzdukan): Began resonance calibration tests for arcane sending network. Initial results unstable — the counter-sequence is interfering with signal propagation. Needs to isolate frequencies. Notes anomalous harmonic she cannot explain.

4. Kael Dravorn (Vornost): Began quiet investigation of swamp hangings. Examined ropework from corpse-willow grove — confirmed old commando knots, pre-founding vintage. Narrowed to original cadre veterans. Three candidates identified, all still serving. Has not yet interrogated.

5. Henric Bale (Fort Vanguard): Received Valania's recall rider. Confused — orders reference companion convergence at Vornost but Bale has no companion to send. Forwarded intelligence packet to Thoron via same rider: eastern perimeter contact patterns suggest coordinated probing, not random incursion.

6. Harren Vael (Riverwatch): Still awaiting Caras response on customs anomaly evidence. Growing nervous. Began keeping duplicate records in case originals 'disappear' on Conorth's desk.

state_changes.name: Valania Lorethor
state_changes.next_action: Monitoring recall timeline; awaiting Caras agent intelligence report

state_changes.name: Suzanne of Corlaine
state_changes.next_action: Travelling to Fort Seawatch with Guldur; 2-3 days transit

state_changes.name: Guldur Emeldyr
state_changes.next_action: Travelling to Fort Seawatch with Suzanne; complaining about terrain

state_changes.name: Kael Dravorn
state_changes.next_action: Three suspects identified from original commando cadre; interrogation pending Thoron's approval

state_changes.text: Recall letters dispatched 30 Ilrym. Suzanne and Guldur en route to Fort Seawatch. Dravorn identified three commando veterans as suspects in swamp hangings. Lithoe's sending network calibration unstable — counter-sequence interference.
